description: Use Telegraf to collect metrics, InfluxDB OSS 2.x to store them

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "grafana_stat_totals_dashboard")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "grafana_stat_total_users")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "grafana_stat_total_orgs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "grafana_stat_totals_datasource")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["_time"], mode:"by")
  |> sum(column: "_value")

panels.description: Average user and system CPU time spent in seconds, summary for ${over} interval

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "process_cpu_seconds_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> derivative(unit: ${over}, nonNegative: true)
  |> yield(name: "nonnegative derivative")

panels.title: Average CPU Usage over ${over}

panels.description: Virtual and Resident memory size in bytes, averages over ${over} interval

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "process_resident_memory_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> derivative(unit: ${over}, nonNegative: true)
  |> yield(name: "nonnegative derivative")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "process_virtual_memory_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> derivative(unit: ${over}, nonNegative: true)
  |> yield(name: "nonnegative derivative")

panels.title: Average Memory Usage over ${over}

from(bucket: "${bucket}")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "grafana_http_request_duration_seconds")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> derivative(unit: ${over}, nonNegative: true)
  |> yield(name: "nonnegative derivative")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "grafana_api_login_post_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "grafana_api_login_oauth_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "grafana_api_login_saml_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "grafana_api_dashboard_get_milliseconds")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] != "count" and r["_field"] != "sum")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "grafana_api_dashboard_get_milliseconds")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count" or r["_field"] == "sum")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 5m, nonNegative: true)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    _value: if r.count == 0 then 0.0 else r.sum / r.count,
    _field: "avg"
  }))
  |> drop(columns: ["count","sum"])
  |> yield(name: "avg")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "grafana_api_dashboard_save_milliseconds")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] != "count" and r["_field"] != "sum")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "grafana_api_dataproxy_request_all_milliseconds")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "grafana_build_info")
|> keyValues(keyColumns: ["host"])
|> group()
|> distinct(column:  "host")
list.name: hostname
list.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "grafana_build_info")
|> keyValues(keyColumns: ["host"])
|> group()
|> distinct(column:  "host")

title: Grafana self-monitoring over InfluxDB 0.1
